description: This file sets up an agent with specific tools for stock analysis, including yfinance tools, and makes a request to share stock information.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent configured with tools and instructions for stock analysis.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Provides tools for fetching stock data, analyst recommendations, and fundamentals.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response, possibly formatted as markdown.
